Label_Texts.create_modification_error_line_one: You can't currently create a new modification as you already have one in draft. You can only have one modification with the status 'In draft' at a time. You'll need to either submit or delete your 'In draft' modification before creating anotherâ€™
Label_Texts.create_modification_error_line_two: If you also have a modification that is currently with sponsor or review body, you'll need to wait until a final outcome has been issued before you can submit another.
